I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch? I'd always wanted to be an actress. I did it in high school and fell in love with it, but I was distracted by the modeling industry because I wanted to travel and get out of my hometown. It was the easier ticket.See more»Trivia:Inducted into the Texas Film of Fame on March 6,2014 in Austin, Texas.See more»Trademark:Often plays sexualized teenagers (Friday Night Lights (2004), Alpha Dog (2006), Hidden Palms (2007), Never Back Down (2008) and All the Boys Love Mandy Lane (2006)).Star Sign:Taurusif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameDidYouKnowWidget_finished');}if (typeof uet == 'function') {uet("be", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if (typeof uex == 'function') {uex("ld", "NameDidYouKnowWidget", {wb: 1});}if ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_started');}Getting Started|Contributor Zone »Contribute to This PageEdit pageif ('csm' in window) {csm.measure('csm_NameContributeWidget_finished');}if(typeof uet === 'function'){uet('bb','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}Your Next Binge Watch AwaitsLooking for something to watch?
